channel.title: Changing Prayer Names [317/377] help
channel.description:
ok, in the prayers you put your cursor above
it says ok for example the lvl 10 prayer
level 10 Rock Skin increase your defence by 10%
how do i change this text?
if someone knows can you reply back please?
Thanks :)
